statements: UPDATE biometric_identification_data SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', nationality='US', biometric_data=decode('010101010101', 'hex') WHERE user_id=12345;
UPDATE biometric_identification_data SET nationality='FR', first_name='Alice', biometric_data=decode('FFAAFFAAFF', 'hex'), last_name='Smith' WHERE user_id=54321;
UPDATE biometric_identification_data SET nationality = 'USA', first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Johnson' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE biometric_identification_data SET first_name = 'Bob', last_name = 'Smith', nationality = 'Canada', biometric_data = E'\\x012345' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE biometric_data SET country_code = 'USA' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 500.00 WHERE sender_user_id = 54321;
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_template = E'\x7F9988173A89129F9', country_code = 'USA' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 1500.50, transaction_date = '2022-05-20 12:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = 'new fingerprint data' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_info SET country = 'Canada', phone_number = '1234567890' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = 'new_fingerprint_data', face_data = 'updated_face_data' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 500.75, timestamp = '2022-03-15 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 201;
UPDATE biometric_data SET iris_scan_data = 'new_iris_data' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE payments SET currency_code = 'USD', amount = 100.50, payment_status = 'PAID' WHERE payment_id = 456;
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = 'new fingerprint data', face_data = 'new face data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE payments SET amount = 500.50, currency_code = 'USD' WHERE payment_id = 100;
UPDATE biometric_identifications SET biometric_data = 'Updated fingerprint data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET verification_status = false, first_name = 'John' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE biometric_identifications SET biometric_data = 'New Biometric Data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 5000.00, timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE sender_id = 100 AND receiver_id = 200;
